title: America Trying To Kill You With Cars, TikTok Parent Pranks 1.5.22
itunes:title: America Trying To Kill You With Cars, TikTok Parent Pranks 1.5.22
description:
In episode 1057, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, actor, and writer Greta Titelman to discuss RIP Betty White, Majorly Tainted Goon gets booted from social media, fights with Dan Crenshaw, TikTok check - parents smearing “shit” on their kids, Car Crash Deaths Are Up With Fewer Cars On The Road, Wheel of Fortune is a Goddamn Trainwreck and more!

  1. Majorly Tainted Goon gets booted from social media, fights with Dan Crenshaw
  2. TikTok check - parents smearing “shit” on their kids
  3. Car Crash Deaths Are Up With Fewer Cars On The Road
  4. Wheel of Fortune is a Goddamn Trainwreck
  5. ‘Wheel of Fortune’ Fans Outraged After Contestant Loses on Misspelled Puzzle
  6. Pat Sajak Faces Backlash for Mocking a Contestant’s Speech Impediment
  7. Wheel of Fortune fans slam show rule after contestant loses due to technicality
  8. Pat Sajak says his tweet calling climate change believers 'unpatriotic racists' was a 'parody'


Follow: @Gertie_Bird

Senior Superlative Podcast

Listen: B Side by Khruangbin and Leon Bridges

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
